title: Stjepan Andrijašević
text: Stjepan "Stipe" Andrijašević (born 7 February 1967) is a former Croatian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He capped 5 times for <a href="Croatia%20national%20football%20team">Croatia</a>. In September 1989 he was injured in road accident which took him out of football for more than two years. He has two sons, Pjero (born 1988) and <a href="Franko%20Andrija%C5%A1evi%C4%87">Franko</a> (born 1991), and both of them are football players.
